summary.para: Get the properties of a render target view.

param.name: pDesc
param.para: Pointer to the description of a render target view (see ).

summary.para: A render-target-view interface identifies the render-target subresources that can be accessed during rendering.

remarks.para: To create a render-target view, call . To bind a render-target view to the pipeline, call .
A rendertarget is a resource that can be written by the output-merger stage at the end of a render pass. Each render-target should also have a corresponding depth-stencil view.
